channel.title: Hazzscape | Best 718 | GE | PvM's | Pking | In-game Highscores | and more
channel.description:
Link to Forum http://hazzscape.shivtr.com/forums Download client at http://hazzscape.weebly.com
Hazzscape-718 is a brand new server, you come and try our server out we hope you enjoy your stay .Our community has alot of friendly people and Kind staff , everyone who plays respect to all players. You will get addicted to this server there are some many things to do and server is online 24/7 on vps, so no downtime, staff are online Everyday and are willing to help anyone in need of help.
This server has many features including:
Crystal Key chest All Godwars bosses Bork Summoning Unique Dungeoneering Soulwars Duel arena Pest Control Fight kiln Fight Caves Recipe for Disaster Runespan Dominion Tower Castle Wars All skill Teleports Working Dwarf Cannon(only at rockcrabs) Grand exchange Slayer Teleports Thieving Stalls All altars Unique Shops
Some pictures of the server:
-Home- [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/dpda2t.jpg[/img]
-PlayerStart- [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/287p62x.png[/img]
-Training Area- [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/x2qnux.jpg[/img]
-Hazzscape NEW teleports- [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2j10gn9.png[/img]
-Crystal Key Chest!- [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2zp2p1l.png[/img]
-Soul Wars- [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/xppiyd.png[/img]
-Pest Control- [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/scgggn.png[/img]
-Switching to old/new looks!- [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2i6ophu.png[/img]
-Working goliath gloves from the Dominion Tower!- [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2vb2d8y.png[/img]
-Money Making Methods- Thieving [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/15n8tvd.jpg[/img]
-Revenants- [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2wbxl4n.png[/img]
And Alot more by skilling,pking and pvm!
Join Today [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2qkpm6s.png[/img]
So many more updates thanks to our Owner-Hazz and his Staff, unique content, custom items, bosses and many other amazing scripts/code created by the most dedicated and experienced staff team yet to appear in the RSPS community!
Please take the time to check out www.hazzscape.weebly.com alot of hard work got into making it. Looking forward towards your visit!

item.title: Hazzscape | Best 718 | GE | PvM's | Pking | In-game Highscores | and more
item.dc:creator: @Ykcud Ykcud
item.description:
@Ykcud wrote:

Is this going to be a vote or pay to win server or plans to be in the future? If not I will check it out.

Read full topic
